title: infiniflow/ragflow
summary: RAGFlow is a leading open-source Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) engine that fuses cutting-edge RAG with Agent capabilities to create a superior context layer for LLMs

title: spicyneuron/llama-matchmaker
summary: Automatically apply optimal settings to your LLM requests

title: Mintplex-Labs/anything-llm
summary: The all-in-one Desktop & Docker AI application with built-in RAG, AI agents, No-code agent builder, MCP compatibility,  and more.

title: NimaShafie/arch-ai-tect
summary: AI-powered assistant for software architects — generates diagrams, documentation, and structured design artifacts from high-level concepts.

title: apconw/sanic-web
summary: 一个轻量级、支持全链路且易于二次开发的大模型应用项目(Large Model Data Assistant) 支持DeepSeek/Qwen3等大模型 基于 Dify 、LangChain/LangGraph、Ollama&Vllm、Sanic 和 Text2SQL 📊 等技术构建的一站式大模型应用开发项目，采用 Vue3、TypeScript 和 Vite 5 打造现代UI。它支持通过 ECharts 📈 实现基于大模型的数据图形化问答，具备处理 CSV 文件 📂 表格问答的能力。同时，能方便对接第三方开源 RAG 系统 检索系统 🌐等，以支持广泛的通用知识问答。

title: Almaskhan123/WeKnora
summary: 🔗 Connect and enhance your communication with WeKnora, a powerful platform for seamless integration and interaction in WeChat services.

title: langchain4j/langchain4j
summary: LangChain4j is an open-source Java library that simplifies the integration of LLMs into Java applications through a unified API, providing access to popular LLMs and vector databases. It makes implementing RAG, tool calling (including support for MCP), and agents easy. LangChain4j integrates seamlessly with various enterprise Java frameworks.

title: Palm1r/QodeAssist
summary: QodeAssist is an AI-powered coding assistant plugin for Qt Creator

title: MandalAutomations/Ollama-Devcontainer
summary: This project provides a ready-to-use development environment for Python projects with integrated LLM (Language Model) capabilities using Ollama. It includes a pre-configured VS Code Dev Container setup with Docker Compose, a Python 3.10 environment, and example code for interacting with Ollama models.

title: jsbattig/code-indexer
summary: Python application to index code locally supporting ollama and voyageai to power semantic searching a large codebase

title: tecno-consultores/llm-lab
summary: Docker Compose to install N8N, Openweb UI, Qdrant, Ollama, EvolutionAPI and other systems.

title: yuma-shintani/ollama-model-library
summary: Get Ollama models from the Ollama library website (https://ollama.com/library) in JSON format.

title: lobehub/lobe-chat
summary: 🤯 LobeHub - an open-source, modern design AI Agent Workspace. Supports multiple AI providers, Knowledge Base (file upload / RAG ), one click install MCP Marketplace and Artifacts / Thinking. One-click FREE deployment of your private AI Agent application.

title: schmitech/orbit
summary: An adaptable, open-source context-aware inference engine designed for privacy, control, and independence from proprietary models.

title: cgoinglove/better-chatbot
summary: Just a Better Chatbot. Powered by Agent & MCP & Workflows.

title: LearningCircuit/local-deep-research
summary: Local Deep Research achieves ~95% on SimpleQA benchmark (tested with GPT-4.1-mini). Supports local and cloud LLMs (Ollama, Google, Anthropic, ...). Searches 10+ sources - arXiv, PubMed, web, and your private documents. Everything Local & Encrypted.

title: Arezkiiiii/mini_llm
summary: 🚀 Build and understand a Large Language Model from scratch using PyTorch through hands-on notebooks focused on core Transformer concepts.

title: MooNyeu/granitepi-4-nano
summary: 🔒 Run a large language model locally on your Raspberry Pi 5 with IBM Granite 4.0 for private, cloud-free AI inference.

title: pipeshub-ai/pipeshub-ai
summary: PipesHub is a fully extensible and explainable workplace AI platform for enterprise search and workflow automation
